body:
Brian,

This is done, everything looks to be in good shape, will submit some jobs
shortly. We recently turned off my gwms frontend daemon (the one configured
with the frontend.xml config file, not the condor frontends) to use one
that is being operated by central OSG services on our behalf. Is there
anything I need to do to change my configuration on my frontend schedd and
collector hosts to recognize the new location?

-Richard J.

On Thu, Jun 8, 2017 at 3:09 AM, Brian Bockelman <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Hi Richard - one small favor to ask. In the Dockerfile for this image, can
> you download the software via HTTPS or do a checksum verification after
> downloading via HTTP?
>
> Many thanks!
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/opensciencegrid/cvmfs-singularity-sync/pull/13#issuecomment-307018837>,
> or mute the thread
